name: Rosé Pasta with Chicken
instructions: Split chicken breasts in half and season with salt, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, and any other desired spices.
Cook chicken in a hot pan for 5 minutes per side, until cooked through.
Add sliced onions and minced garlic to the same pan.
Add heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in pasta water and cooked pasta.
